Summary: multible lights (6-8) zigzaging chaseing very very high and wide formation 1000 miles between?
divs: sighting detailsi1)n backyard looking north, know north because of cb hobbie beam antenna bearing etc.. 2)odd movment held my attention before i thought to go wake up girlfriend but could tell from their speed they would be able to be seen by her if i could get her awake and outside within the time i sometimes know there is to point out a regular satalite as she likes to watch them to , no big deal. 3)thought these lights were more than anything i\we've seen and wanted someone else to see them too. they were very high and must be at times thousands of miles away from each other yet coming back to stay around each other 40 mulitable bright and dull far away lights , very high and moving in a pack that spread way out and then back tight together rolling and zig zaging at diferent speeds as distances were collectively acounted for. 5) felt like i didn't want to be the only one to know what is there. 6) lost sight of them like one loses sight of regular satalittes as they make there way out of the suns rays except these were headed toward the north east where the sun would be coming up looking up for regular satalights that sometime are visable in the early morning north east sky.. saw very high lights but not as high as usual satalites that appear as single slow moving common dots of light.. in these case there were maybe 6 or 7 lights moving and stopping then kinda taking turns 'step stoneing" in a patch of sky that was to wide of an area to be understood as something seen before..
